author: andschwa
body: There now exists uninstall scripts and properly supported RC2 methods to obtain .NET CLI, thus we can rewrite some of the bootstrap script. See the [new website](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#ubuntu).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
But we're going to wait on this:

> Note: our apt-get feed is experiencing some difficulties with certificates, so please use the install script (as explained below) as a workaround. We will go back to using apt-get as soon as we fix the issue.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Resolved by #1093. We're using the obtain scripts instead of the feed, for quoted reasons.

title: Update Start-PSBootstrap for new obtain scripts
